H0.text: Telling the teacher immediately is the safety procedure a student should follow when a thermometer is broken during a lab experiment.

H1.text: Stopping the experiment immediately is the safety procedure a student should follow when a thermometer is broken during a lab experiment.

H2.text: Sweep the glass into a biohazard container is the safety procedure a student should follow when a thermometer is broken during a lab experiment.

H3.text: Using a paper towel to pick up the pieces is the safety procedure a student should follow when a thermometer is broken during a lab experiment.
